net.casper.io.file.def

Class CDataFileDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.io.file.def.CDataFileDef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CDataFile

    public class CDataFileDef
extends Object
implements CDataFile
    Stores meta-data (name, columns, primary keys, cell readers) for a casper dataset that is loaded from a file.
    Version:
    $Revision: 190 $
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Detail

      • CDataFileDef

        public CDataFileDef(String name,
            String primaryKey)
        Construct a DatasetDef without specifying any columns. Column information will be loaded from the file using the default Column cell reader.
        Parameters:
        name - Dataset name.
        primaryKey - The names of the columns that form the primary key.

      • CDataFileDef

        public CDataFileDef(String name,
            String columns,
            org.omancode.rmt.cellreader.CellReader<?>[] cellReaders,
            String primaryKey)
        Construct a DatasetDef.
        Parameters:
        name - casper container name.
        columns - Names of the columns in the dataset, separated by commas. eg: "firstname,lastname" (NB: do not include a space after the comma).
        cellReaders - Cell readers for each column.
        primaryKey - The names of the columns that form the primary key, separated by commas, eg: "firstname,lastname" (NB: do not include a space after the comma).

      • CDataFileDef

        public CDataFileDef(String name,
            String[] columns,
            org.omancode.rmt.cellreader.CellReader<?>[] cellReaders,
            String[] primaryKey)
        Construct a DatasetDef.
        Parameters:
        name - casper container name.
        columns - Names of the columns in the dataset
        cellReaders - Cell readers for each column.
        primaryKey - The names of the columns that form the primary key.
